sources.name: DriversSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DriversSource

sources.name: DriverShiftTrips
sources.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		driverid as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DriverShiftTrips

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
DriversSource, DriverShiftTrips join(DriversSource@driverid == DriverShiftTrips@driverid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
